overview: From 1957 to 1988, Angela Park in Drums, Pennsylvania entertained many local adults and children. Join us as we look back at one of the most exciting family fun parks in the United States. Rediscover the fascinating fun facts about what made Angela Park unique.  Relive your childhood memories as we explore all the rides the park featured though its history and learn how one amazing pig encouraged kids to keep the park clean. This documentary includes extremely rare park footage from opening day through its closing and auctioning of its popular rides. Bring your memories back to life or enjoy discovering one of the area's lost treasures for the very first time!
tagline: The Good Little Amusement Park on 309 in Drums, PA.
title: Angela Park: The Documentary
